trans-unit.source: Assists interoperation between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] code.
trans-unit.target: Segít közötti való együttműködés [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] és [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] kódot.

trans-unit.source: Members of this class allows the caller to have internal access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND and the parent HWND of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály tagjai lehetővé teszi, hogy a hívó belső eléréséhez a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND és a szülő HWND, egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Window>.</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: The proper security checks are performed by those members.
trans-unit.target: A megfelelő biztonsági ellenőrzéseket hajtja végre ezekhez a tagokhoz.

trans-unit.source: Use this class whenever you need a more specific object based on its HWND.
trans-unit.target: A HWND alapján több adott objektumokat kell használni, ez az osztály.

trans-unit.source: An example scenario is if you need to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Egy példán keresztül, ha szeretné-e a gazdagép egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] párbeszédpanelén egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] alkalmazás.

trans-unit.source: Initialize the WindowInteropHelper with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window object for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A WindowInteropHelper inicializálni egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ablak objektum a párbeszédpanel.

trans-unit.source: You can then get the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window's handle (HWND) from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A> property and specify the owner for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window with the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Owner%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ezután a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ablak leíróját (HWND) az a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>tulajdonság, és adja meg a tulajdonosát a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] -ablakot a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Owner%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Owner%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use WindowInteropHelper when hosting a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi példakód bemutatja, hogyan WindowInteropHelper használata esetén egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] párbeszédpanelén egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] alkalmazás.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CorePseudocode/corepseudocode.cs#windowinterophelper)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/corepseudocode/corepseudocode.vb#windowinterophelper)] Another scenario supported by this class is to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> object from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Window> object.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[CorePseudocode #WindowInteropHelper](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CorePseudocode/corepseudocode.cs#windowinterophelper)][!code-vb[CorePseudocode #WindowInteropHelper](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/corepseudocode/corepseudocode.vb#windowinterophelper) ] az osztály támogatja egy másik helyzet lehet megszerezni a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>objektum egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Window>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> enables direct processing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] messages through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>lehetővé teszi, hogy közvetlen feldolgozása [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] keresztül küldött üzenetek a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: By using <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> in place of a <xref:System.Windows.Window> you can still handle messages that have no equivalent or handling in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>és <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>helyett egy <xref:System.Windows.Window>továbbra is kezelheti, amelyek nem egyenértékű vagy a kezelési üzenetek [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Create a WindowInteropHelper with the <xref:System.Windows.Window> source, then call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A> on the WindowInteropHelper to get from HWND to <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.
trans-unit.target: Hozzon létre egy WindowInteropHelper a <xref:System.Windows.Window>forráskiszolgálón, majd hívja <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>a WindowInteropHelper <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> HWND lekérése a</xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper"></xref> class for a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper"> </xref> egy meghatározott osztály [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ablak.

trans-unit.source: The window can be a dialog box, or a window that is otherwise not suitable for being hosted within the bounds of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Az ablak egy párbeszédpanel, vagy egy ablak, amely más módon nem alkalmas határain belül üzemeltetett lehet egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] alkalmazás.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window object.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ablak objektum.

trans-unit.source: Creates the HWND of the window if the HWND has not been created yet.
trans-unit.target: A az ablak HWND hoz létre, ha a HWND még nem lett létrehozva.

trans-unit.source: Use the EnsureHandle method when you want to separate window handle (HWND) creation from the actual showing of the managed <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: A EnsureHandle módszert használja, ha el szeretné különíteni az ablak leíró (HWND) létrehozását a tényleges ábrázoló a felügyelt <xref:System.Windows.Window>.</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you have an automation client that can accomplish its tasks without the need for showing a window.
trans-unit.target: Ez akkor hasznos, ha egy automatizálási ügyfél, amely a feladatok ablak megjelenítése nélkül érhető el.

trans-unit.source: If the native window has not yet been created, this method creates the native window, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A> property, and returns the HWND.
trans-unit.target: A natív ablak még nem hozott létre, ha ezzel a módszerrel hoz létre a natív ablakban beállítása a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>tulajdonság, és csak a HWND.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the native window has been created already, the handle of the existing native window is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ha a natív ablak már létrejött, a meglévő natív ablak leíróját adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: If the native window is created as a result of calling this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Window.SourceInitialized> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ha a natív ablak jön létre a metódus hívása miatt a <xref:System.Windows.Window.SourceInitialized>egy esemény jelenik meg.</xref:System.Windows.Window.SourceInitialized>

trans-unit.source: Querying the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A> property after the EnsureHandle method is called returns the existing window handle.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>tulajdonság után a EnsureHandle metódus lehívásra kerül a meglévő ablakleíró adja vissza.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The visual tree is not attached to the window until after the <xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: A vizuális fában azonban nem kapcsolódik az ablak addig után a <xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A>metódust.</xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the EnsureHandle method more than one time does not create new window handles.
trans-unit.target: A metódus hívása a EnsureHandle egynél többször nem hoz létre új ablak kezeli.

trans-unit.source: Calling the EnsureHandle method when the handle has already been created by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A> method does not create a new window handle.
trans-unit.target: A EnsureHandle metódus hívása, ha a leíró már létrejött hívásával a <xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A>metódus nem hoz létre egy új ablak leíróját.</xref:System.Windows.Window.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: A native window is only created when no handle exists when the EnsureHandle method is called.
trans-unit.target: Egy natív ablak csak jön létre, ha nincs leíró létezik EnsureHandle metódus hívásakor.

trans-unit.source: Window properties that are set by using native window APIs via p/invoke may not appear in the managed window APIs.
trans-unit.target: Natív ablakában API-k segítségével p/invoke beállított ablak tulajdonságok nem szerepelhet a felügyelt API-k ablakban.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the window to be topmost by using the native MS_EX_TOPMOST flag after the EnsureHandle method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Window.Topmost%2A> property is not guaranteed to reflect the native setting.
trans-unit.target: Ha megadta az időszak legfelső a natív MS_EX_TOPMOST jelző használatával, miután a EnsureHandle metódus lehívásra kerül, például a <xref:System.Windows.Window.Topmost%2A>tulajdonság nem biztos, hogy tükrözze a natív beállítás.</xref:System.Windows.Window.Topmost%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that represents the HWND.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.IntPtr>, amely jelzi, hogy a HWND.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets the window handle for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window that is used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a ablakleírója egy [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , amelyen a létrehozásához használt <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ablakleíró (HWND).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] owner window.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a leíróját a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tulajdonos ablakkal.

trans-unit.source: You can reparent windows by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Windows is Fölérendelés úgy, hogy ezt a tulajdonságot.

trans-unit.source: As is true for general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, do not reparent windows that are already in use.
trans-unit.target: Ez igaz az általános [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] programozási, nem Fölérendelés windows, amely már használatban van.

trans-unit.source: The owner window handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: A tulajdonos ablakleíró (HWND).
